text: Manglietia sinica is a species of plant in the family Magnoliaceae. It is endemic to China. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Manglietia sinica. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Manglietia sinica
